seg.output:
I hear that a day has been set in Zurich on Othmary, for the payment of dues. I assume Captain Berweger will come from Appenzell. I will wait for him, if God wills, to come with him.
The aldermen will go to Tänicken tomorrow first.
May God strengthen you and us. May God strengthen you and us. Greeting to your dear housewives, father, mother, servants. May God strengthen you and us. Greeting to your dear housewives, father, mother, servants. Praying to God for us.
Acted in Elgow, on Martinmas, in the 32nd year.
Your poor Hans Vogler.
To my beloved lord and benefactor M. Hainrich Pullinger, preacher of the city of Zurich, to hand.
